sidebar_about_desc: I'm a professional passionate about technology. This is my digital portfolio.
about_intro_p1: Hello! I'm a professional interested in technology and innovation, with experience in creating digital solutions. I am always looking to learn and apply best practices in development.
about_intro_p2: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading about market trends and contributing to the developer community. I believe technology should be accessible and useful for everyone.
about_intro_p3: In my free time, I love traveling, photographing natural landscapes and practicing outdoor sports. These activities inspire me and bring new perspectives to my professional projects.
